document_data.title: Where the Teak Snakes Slither
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Where the Teak Snakes Slither''''' is a one round adventure module set in the [[Living City]] organized play program. It was published in 1994, and is intended for adventurers of all levels.

{{quote|''This adventure will take the player characters far from the environs of RAVENS BLUFF, the Living City. It will spirit them away to the [[Land of Fate]].''}}
document_data.Synopsis: During a dinner, a group of adventurers was tracked down at [[Embrol Sludge's Eatery and Shell Shop]] by a messenger from the distant [[Waterdeep]], who was tasked with delivering a single magic item – the inheritance from one of the adventurer's uncle. However, the item's sorcery was accidentally unleashed, and it spirited the table, the adventurers, the messenger, and an impatient waitress to the distant land of [[Zakhara]]'s [[Grey Jungle]]. The group embarked on a short adventure to discover the connection between their uncle and the Land of Fate, an encounter with a [[sea djinn]], and a trick to a dangerous [[segarran]] at the heart of the jungle. Eventually, the heroes defeated the malevolent cultists of [[Ragarra]] and gained passage back to [[Ravens Bluff]], either through many long months, if not years, of travel or with the djinn's help. [[Marid]] was interested in exploring the "Bluff of the Raves" for himself and flew the group back to [[the Vast]].
